website_summaries.verdict: A durable reflective dog vest with superb visibility, but when it comes to sizing, the design could do with improvement. May be more suitable for large dogs with wide backs.
pros: Lightweight nylon is comfortable and breathable, but can take a beating from active pups
Vibrant color is easy to spot
Front, side, and rear reflective strips provide full visibility in low light and can be seen from 500'
Hook-and-loop fasteners are easy to adjust
cons: Sizes tend to run a bit wide, but may be short on longer dogs

customer_reviews.title: Highly reflective, great visibility! Great for walking and hunting season!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Petflect Reflective Dog Vest in size small for my Beagle (20-25 lbs.) The sizing is perfect for him, and it fits great (I posted 2 photos in the customer photos.) The material is lightweight and comfortable. The orange is very bright, and the silver portions are highly reflective-- both of which provide great visibility! I would recommend this product for leash walks on roadways and on trails, especially at night or dawn/dusk and during hunting season. The material probably wouldn't hold up for use in thick brush where it might get snagged. I would definitely purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: AnimalLover24-7

customer_reviews.title: Sizing information
customer_reviews.text: My 61lb beagle/sharpei mix is 20" at the neck and 30" at the deepest part of his chest. The medium works fine. The large is longer with the velcro strap hitting him at his narrowest (waist-25") leaving some strap dangling but still a secure fit. Fine product and even though it doesn't look like it has a lot of reflective material, it blazes like a neon sign when car lights strike it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality - not the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality! I have a small black dog and taking walks at night was always an issue since she tends to hang back behind me and my other dog. She's about 22 lbs and I ordered the small, but the belly straps are way too long. The bodice itself is quite near perfect including the straps around the neck, but I have to do a 2x knot around her belly to keep it in place. An adjustable strap might be a better option to fit small thinner vs. fluffy dogs.
customer_reviews.author: MsDJ

customer_reviews.title: Vest is highly reflective, but velcro is very cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Vest is highly reflective, but velcro is very cheap. Doesn't fasten well. For a active dog I can't see this holding well. Almost need more of a button/buckle to keep the vest in place. Especially will long hair dogs who's fur could get in the velcro, making it even less secure. As the dog moves, runs, jumps, the vest really "shifts" around and will come loose and fall off. Paw prints are on both sides with a reflective strip.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the large vest for our family dog during hiking trips so he would be seen more easily. Mission accomplished! It was easy to put on and take off, it is light weight so it is not too hot for our dog to wear. He wore it the entire day without any notice to it. He was easily seen in the woods wearing this vest which made our family feel better about letting him off the leash in the woods. The size large fit our dog great. We haven't yet used it for in town walks at night but I believe the reflective sections of the vest will work great as well. Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Reviews2help

customer_reviews.title: Bright orange with reflective stripes and pattern make me feel comfortable to allow my dog to play outside at day ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for a few days. This is what I expected. Bright orange with reflective stripes and pattern make me feel comfortable to allow my dog to play outside day and night. I also use a LED light to use at night. I bought size small and am not sure what size dogs they had in mind when designing/sizing. The Velcro positioned on the belly would easily fit a 50# dog. I had to reposition the Velcro on the belly for my 20#. Neck size is OK strangely. I wish the seller have the size info on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got a size medium for my Labradoodle. She's a tall slender 45 lbs with a big rib cage. Medium fits perfect. She's very comfortable in it. We live out in the county/woods and we just keep it on her all week of deer hunting season. She also wears it bird hunting. It actually deflects burrs pretty well too (especially since her fur is basically like velcro to burrs). Good reflection too
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: Must have during hunting season
customer_reviews.text: The medium size vest fit my 40 lb. beagle very well and it doesn't shift. We bought a larger version for my 100 lb. dog and it shifts on her such that a worry she might lose it. I also bought this one because it seemed to have a lot of reflective coating which helps me see them when they're out at night.
customer_reviews.author: catamountj

customer_reviews.title: Great vest - but they need to make bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something easy to put on/off and *bright orange* so the hunters don't mistake my German Shepherds for deer or some other animal. Very lightweight, inexpensive, bright orange, easy to pop on and off. My only complaint is that they need to make bigger sizes. The large fits my smallest German Shepherd (60-63lbs) with a little room to spare but doesn't even come close to fitting my two larger GSD's at 75 & 80 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C

customer_reviews.title: We live in a hunters paradise so all my dogs wear these vests
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are a little off. The small is actually a bit large so for my size small dogs I use my sewing machine to take them in to fit. When my big dog was smaller he could wear the small as a medium. Now he’s nearly 65lbs and wears the medium but rapidly moving into the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Corki Weart

customer_reviews.title: Love these.  Perfect for walking during hunting season!
customer_reviews.text: We got two; one for our 80lb Goldendoodle and one for our 60lb Goldendoodle. Got the large and medium and they fit perfectly. The large was made of a heavier material than the medium. I'm a bit confused with other reviewers that said they were cheaply made and flimsy. My dogs run off leash through the Northern Wisconsin forest, with the 80lb male being a year old with a lot of energy, and they look brand new. He even rolled in something, and I just hosed it off when I got home. Couldn't even tell it was previously dirty. Love these. They're a must if you are walking during hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tomasoski

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 70 lb lab dachshund mix perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for three weeks, and she has no problem with me installing it. The website clearly states using the chest measurement (and their charts) as the guiding dimension when selecting which size to buy. I recommend adjusting the neck once and sliding it off over the head: it quickly slides over the head during subsequent usage. It probably helps that I bought my own reflective vest and wore it for a week of walks before her vest arrived. Hopefully, it will be somewhat durable. It definitely aids drivers when walking in low visibility conditions. Although, she regrets not being a stealth hound anymore. Yes, I really can see it in her eyes,
customer_reviews.author: Over 50

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting our yellow lab during hunting season
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our dog (a 70 lb yellow lab) to wear outside during hunting season. It worked great. It didn't seem to bother her, and the Velcro held up to her running around and rolling in the grass. It also washed up pretty well. There are a few mud stains I couldn't get out, but the dog smell comes out easily in the wash (which is more important to me than the mud stains...). Most importantly, though, the orange is very visible from most angles. The reflector paws and strips show up at night too, but I can't say they were super noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is a material that doesn't get sopping ...
customer_reviews.text: Being in the woods in hunting season means wearing orange. This fits our lab mix well. The large size fits the full lab. It could be a little longer, as labs are long dogs, but this certainly makes them more visible in the woods. We haven't yet tried them along the roads, but the reflector strips would help in any headlight beams. I like that it is a material that doesn't get sopping wet, yet it doesn't seem like it would crack in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: nomdeplume

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my silver lab when we went up to WI during deer hunting season. She definitely was easy to spot in the woods with this vest on! It was a cheaper feeling material than I thought it would be, but it didn't tear when she nipped at it a little or running around in the brush so I was pretty surprised! Definitely worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Bru

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. Very lightweight fabric vest with simple Velcro attachment ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it's just about perfect. Very lightweight fabric vest with simple Velcro attachment straps and large areas of highly reflective material on the sides and reflective tape on the straps. Only improvement I would suggest is more and larger reflective tape on the front strap. The perfect thing for night walks.
customer_reviews.author: Liazard

customer_reviews.title: great for night walks
customer_reviews.text: Now that DST has ended, I don't get home until after dark and my neighborhood is not particularly well-lit. These vests make me feel much safer walking my girls after work. They have winter coats with reflective strips, but it is not cold here yet. These vests feel like cloth, not plastic, and are lightweight enough that I don't worry about them overheating in 50 degree weather. The trim, stripe, and paw print are very reflective when light hits them and combined with a clip-on light for each of their collars and a head lamp for me, we are very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: High visibility and well-made!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 73 pound greyhound with a chest approximately 34 inches around. This fit her like a glove and provided really good coverage. She has the coloring and look of a deer so I wanted her to be very visible and this does that. It covers 3/4 of her body. The reflective trim is very good and it is very high visibility. It is lightweight but feels very durable to me and hasn't snagged on anything though she doesn't go in very thick brush. The velcro is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my 45# cocker spaniel mix
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my 45# cocker spaniel mix. I use it on her at night letting her out to go to the bathroom so she is visible, so casual use. Got a size M and it fits well. Straps around the belly are each about 8.5” long, making the entire belly measurement about 34”. Laid out, from neck strap- neck strap (measured w a sewing tape) is 24”. Hopefully that makes sense as I wasn’t able to find measurements and guessed.
customer_reviews.author: Genavieve

customer_reviews.title: "Large" just is not that large.
customer_reviews.text: Neck/chest straps reach 27", actually shorter since there must be overlap for velcro to lock, closer to 19" Girth straps 38" ...same thing, think 30" if velcro locks with 4" from both sides. Topline, from neck to tail, is only 16" If your dog is more than 20" from shoulder to tail base, forget it. This picture implies that the garment ends just past the point of hip. For that fit with this size, your dog should be 20" from withers to croup. Or buy a lot of extra velcro and make longer straps....still, this should be called "Medium" at best.
customer_reviews.author: RavenhillTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...until she came back with it lost in the woods.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed great, and definitely a protective safety measure when hunting or walking in the woods in the fall with hunters nearby. One day she lost it, must have got caught on a branch, so potential to rip off, however I would purchase again for my 5 year old rambunctious labrador.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Bright reflective vest - perfect for my all black dog to run in!
customer_reviews.text: My black german shepherd mix frequently runs with me at night. As its getting darker out I needed something bright for her, this is perfect. I was able to cut a small slit in the top for the leash to fit through where her harness is. She really stands out in the dark. For sizing, Med fits great, she is 52 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Cove

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but it could be improved. Use it in the warmer weather but itself and in the winter over the dog's winter jacket. Slips over neck easy and underbelly strap is quick to velcro. Wish the sewn on velcro was longer though. I think the product is designed for slightly wider/broader dogs than my 65 lb lab. I only get a couple inches of velcro contact on the underbelly strap and then have to deal with a several inches of strap to try to tuck in somewhere (always comes untucked and flaps around). My dog gets dirty but I have not had to wash the vest yet, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs. I just wanted something orange on my dog during hunting season. I went to the local pet store and they had orange vests for 45. So while in the store I check Amazon and they had this one for under 10 bucks. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Medium size fits 35lb Puggle
customer_reviews.text: My Puggle is 35lbs and very stocky, so I wasn't sure if I should order the large or medium. After reading other reviews I decided on the medium size. It fits him perfectly and I must say he looks pretty sharp wearing it. I've gotten some compliments while walking him in the park. We don't go hiking in the woods, this jacket is primarily for leash walking the the park/neighborhood only. I wanted him to be highly visible in case he got away from me, to be easier to find. Very lightweight, for visibility only, not warmth. We are thinking about getting another dog and I will definitely order another one of these then. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Medium and Large are the exact same vest!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the large and the medium vests for my 80 and 60 pound labs based on the size charts provided. When both arrived, the vests are exactly the same size and same strap length despite one being labeled a large and one a medium. The medium works perfectly, but the large is a little small. They are definitely reflective at night and the orange is bright and the fabric seems durable, but be forewarned that the sizes are exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: The vest fits my 55 lb dog well. It might be a hair on the large side but I am happy with it as is. My dog is pretty tolerant of most anything and doesn't notice when he is wearing it at all. I got this mainly because I go places where hunters may be around and the orange is what both I and the dog wear on those occassions.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I have added more Velcro to one of the vests to allow it to fit their chest better. The Velcros strength weakened quickly for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 2 of these almost everyday since October. I have added more Velcro to one of the vests to allow it to fit their chest better. The Velcros strength weakened quickly for me. If they roll around much in the snow their vests will come unfastened. Yesterday within the first 10 minutes of our hike they had come loose 8 times. I'm going to have to put stronger Velcro on them if I'm going to keep using them. I do love the design but it needs stronger Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Allen

customer_reviews.title: The vest is great and highly visible
customer_reviews.text: The vest is great and highly visible. My dogs wore them through hunting season and they held up great with them running through the woods and briars, going swimming, etc. My only complaint was I ordered 2 medium and 1 large and got 3 mediums and too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Awalker

customer_reviews.title: Wicked cute vest!
customer_reviews.text: We have always had Irish Setters, and have orange vests for them for hunting season - and year round hiking (easier to see in the woods and it helps a little with keeping debris off their coats). We now hae a 5 month old Border Collie, and needed a smaller vest. The medium vest came today, and while a little big for her now 25 lb body, in another month or so it will be perfect. The reflective paw print is very cute, and will light up like crazy, I'm sure. I may post an update after a few months of use and washings. One request for the company - please make them in XL, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: This vest size large is the perfect size for my labs
customer_reviews.text: This vest size large is the perfect size for my labs, 70lbs. I LOVE this vest. We have woods around our house and the bright orange makes it easy to glance and see where the dogs are in the woods during the day. At night, the reflective tape is very bright. I ordered two vest for two labs. The dogs have worn them all day long on the weekends, swimming, running, rolling around, playing with each other and the vest have held up quite nicely. They got so muddy I washed them and still no problems! One dog got his vest stuck on a thorn bush and tore the material so I'm ordered two more for back ups!
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that hates to have stuff wrapped around her. After searching for a while for something she can wear to keep her safe during hunting season, i found this product. I put it on her and it didnt bother her at all i was surprised. It is very light weight and extremly reflective the material holds up well to brush and wooded areas. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine D

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. I bought this to walk my dog in the evenings when it gets a little hairy to be out on the road, also to hike in the woods during hunting season. The reflective parts of the vest do not seem super reflective, but the orange color is very bright. For the price though, and shipped for free in 2 days, I can't complain too much. The fit works well on my dog-- he is medium size, but 60lbs with a deep chest (pitbull mix) and 19' ish neck. The medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: BWheeler

customer_reviews.title: 2 dogs 2 vests 2 different experiences
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs...lab "deceivers". One dog is about 60 lbs and the large is perfect. My other dog is 77 lbs and the large is not a good fit...too tight and she rolls and it pops off. My smaller dog ran under a fence today and ripped the vest right off and a hole in it. Vest is perfect as a reflector. We run and walk in the dark a lot, so this is what we need.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The color, fit and reflective features on this vest are excellent. Unfortunately, the fabric in not tough enough for an active dog who will be running, rolling or playing while wearing the vest. Within the first 2 hours of use the vest ripped. I contacted Amazon and they issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: lam2015

customer_reviews.title: Dogon It, Be Safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option if you want an affordable, lightweight, visible dog vest. The color, if anything, is actually more vivid than shown. The fabric is a bit flimsy, and I don't see it standing up to a great deal of use. However, it is definitely worth the price. A word of advice - go by the actual measurements. I went by the weight, not by the actual measurements and have to reinforce our vest with an additional piece of velcro....maybe the walking will help my fat doggy fit into the vest better in the future. This is my fault, though, and I did not let that affect my review.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely makes dog stand out in the dark
customer_reviews.text: We lost the first one of these I bought and had to replace it immediately. Looks great ib my dog, is easy to put on him, and he doesn't mind wearing it. Best of all, it definitely makes him stand out and therefore enables me to take him out for exercise at night and feel he's safer from wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stays on my dog great! Easy on
customer_reviews.text: We live in north central Wisconsin, in the country and I ordered this for my dog to wear during deer hunting so no one would accidentally shoot him (even tho he doesn't leave our yard). This stays on my dog great! Easy on, easy off. I ended up ordered one for my parents dog too because this one stayed on better than the expensive one my dad got from Gander Mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Kml

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This vest definitely does its job and the large fits my 70-pound lab perfectly. The chest and belly velcro fixtures aren't too tight and I haven't seen them pop open. The problem I have is the quality or lack thereof. The stitching isn't done well and the fabric is extremely cheap feeling. I was a bit hesitant to buy from Petflect because their website is sketchy as heck, and I guess I can see why. Unfortunately, I can't see this vest lasting very long but it should do the job at least for a bit for our quick, nighttime walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the limited information I got my 30 pound dog a medium..it's massive. I can't Velcro it around her mid section. Even with her harness and thick winter coat under it I still can't properly close it. It's very loose when I fear that it'll fall off when we go running/hiking. It'll work for a temporary very.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is is very useful. The reflective quality is excellent, and it is very light weight. The medium fits my 45lb whippets nicely, but it would be adjustable enough for a somewhat smaller or larger dog. THe ordering info did not help me know what size to order, so I guessed. Since the medium fits, I am ordering a second one for the second whippet. Well designed and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Pillow

customer_reviews.title: The right size?
customer_reviews.text: The dog vest is exactly what I needed. I now feel comfortable with my wife and dog walking through the woods during hunting season. My only quam is there was no size guide so I used others reviews to decide what size. My dog is 55 lbs so I went with the large. It fit the length of her just fine but the Velcro strap was a little loose even at its tightest. If they would of had the Velcro strips a little longer it would have been perfect. I have added a photo of my dog in hopes that others can use it to judge what size to get their dog. Again I went with large.
customer_reviews.author: A+B Loud

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: We got this in order to be able to go hiking during hunting season without having to worry. The vest was very easy to put on (just two velcro straps), nice and thin, and incredibly visible. In the pictures we took the vest really stands out. Since the velcro strap under the belly is in the middle of the vest, the back ends kind of flop out a bit like a cape, but it remains securely fastened so it's not a real problem. Definitely a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are safe and visible
customer_reviews.text: Live on a country road and these work perfectly when I go for a walk with the dogs. They do rip easily on barbed wire fencing as the dogs go under, but that should be a given. These are listed at several local farm stores for 14.99. I wait until they go on Amazon for less than 9 bucks each and buy several at a time. Can't make them for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Woman Ranch

customer_reviews.title: WORTHWHILE PURCHASE - HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where hunting is allowed year round and unfortunately my black and tan German shepherd can look very much like a deer when she runs through the woods on our daily walks. This vest is light-weight, apparently comfortable (she gets very excited when she sees me take it out) and is highly visible. I feel much better knowing that the wildlife in my area don't wear these vests and my dog does, so there's no confusion.;-) It's also pretty visible on our night time walks. All in all, I wish that I had bought one a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: BKLYN COWGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Reflective Dog Vest
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light-weight vest. Makes my dog very noticeable when he wears the vest. Secures well and allows for free movement. The large size fits my fifty pound labradoodle.
customer_reviews.author: cmbogue

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking/running, not ideal for Hunter safety
customer_reviews.text: The velcro is getting a little weak over time (we've had it nearly two years, but have only used it about 10 times). It does the job as far as orange/reflectiveness goes, but if the velcro is getting weak and it tears off, what good is it? So my recommendation would be: if you're using it because you walk/run your dog at night or just want to be seen more easily, this would work well for you. If you're using it (like we do) for Hunting season/because you let your dog run through forest areas, go for something heavier duty that can't get ripped off by a branch or twig.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these vests. One was defective in that it had no VELCRO "LATCH' to connect the front and the SIZE LARGE is extremely SMALL. VERY POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Branson & Barbara Branson

customer_reviews.title: Velcro not velcro-y enough
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed the small vest, so I'll also review the medium. This product is very reflective, and I'm sure good at night, but it does not stay on very well. I ended up buying a vest that clipped on instead of velcro-ed on because of where I walk (a gamelands). I walk through trees and brush with my dog, and the velcro gets a lot of stuff stuck in it. It's not very tight either. I would not recommend this to anyone that walks anywhere his or her dog could get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Rohrbacher

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍 Company/Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my black fur baby can be seen when I walk her after dark. Recommend using the measurements versus weight. My girl is 33 lbs but definitely is not a medium in their scale, but they did everything to work with me! It's perfect, THANK GUYS!
customer_reviews.author: Melisse

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible, limited durability
customer_reviews.text: An OK vest. Very good reflectivity and visibility. The only down side is that it isn't very rugged. WHen hunting pheasants with my dogs these have easily gotten holes town in them from the dog going through light brush. I own both a medium and large sized vest for two different German Shorthair Pointers. Update: Two trips through the washing machine and the stitching has come undone.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: ... she go out to do her business and we love it. Fits great and is quite easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our dog to wear at our cabin during hunting season when she go out to do her business and we love it. Fits great and is quite easy to put on and take off. Highly reccomend everyone gets one, rural areas OR urban. Makes the animal so much easier to see, especially with the reflective marking on it
customer_reviews.author: T&M GiaD52

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something like this so that you can see him better around ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pup because we go for walks at 4 AM before I go to work. I wanted something like this so that you can see him better around this time (he's a black lab/pit mix). I bought a large and it fits perfectly on him. He is shorter than most labs but his chest is the size of a pure bred lab. And it definitely does it's job. It's also light weight and he doesn't even notice it's on. Makes me feel better that people will have a chance of seeing him better at night since we don't have sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my all black dogs when we walk/run. I didn't realize how invisible they were, even on a well lit street, at night until I couldn't see a neighbor and their dog walking. The jackets are lightweight and would probably have trouble holding up for a long period of time in an "outdoor/wilderness" environment. Since these are only used for walking and running, they're perfect. Also easy to put off and on. I got a large for my 50 lb dog and it's a bit big. Possibly could do a medium.
customer_reviews.author: LilPea

customer_reviews.title: Works and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't completely sure about size, but I use this on a medium-sized Golden Retriever. She is 60 lbs and average build (not stocky or skinny). It fits her perfectly, but is definitely on the tight side. I only gave 4 stars because there could be more built-in adjustability. If my dog was any bigger, it would be too tight. At first it doesn't seem like there's much reflective material, but it lights up at night when hit with light.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for more!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Fit and Visibility The Bad: Light duty, made for dog walking on a leash. Improvements needed: Better Velcro, better stitching with reinforcement of stress points, tougher materials. I used this vest 4 times with my 2 dogs and it is falling apart. Like so many things, it is a good idea that they failed to make into a good product. I will patch it up and make the needed quality improvements myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Le May

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  Easy to get on/off, and very visible in all conditions
customer_reviews.text: We have two yellow labs that are getting old and don't keep up with us on our walks as well any more. These are very easy to slip on and off. The dogs don't mind wearing them, in fact they get excited when I get them out because that means it's time for a walk! The bright orange can be seen in daylight, and there is lots of reflective tape for night visibility. It gives me great peace of mind that anyone can see them from some distance away, especially when one of my dogs sometimes takes a little "rest" right in the middle of our dirt road!!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Geek

customer_reviews.title: Good visible vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for my dogs to wear during hunting season when we are out in the woods. The vest is not made for rough wear or any rain etc. I bought them because they easy to store in my vehicle. They are great for high visibility but again not for abusive wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for Running
customer_reviews.text: This size large vest is perfect for my Boarder Collie/Australian Shepard mix. I bought it more for the orange (to warn hunters) than the reflective stuff, but the reflective surfaces do make me feel more secure when we go for early morning road runs. The vest itself is relatively light weight, but thus far its stood up to our trail runs (4 weeks, 2-4 trail runs per week). The trails around here are relatively well kept, but it does involve running through some brush. I probably wouldn't recommend this product if your dog was going to play rough in the vest, however light to medium play is probably fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kane

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vest for my girlfriend's dog. It fit well and made the dog extremely visible at night. The ad says drivers should see the vest up to 500 feet away. I wouldn't argue with that analysis. After seeing how well it worked for the one dog I bought one for the other dog. We had tried lighted leashes and collars. There were problems with charging the batteries on those, but no such problem with the reflective vests. I'd buy it again and recommend it wholeheartedly
customer_reviews.author: kmelub

customer_reviews.title: Vest is a hit with our dog but a bit large
customer_reviews.text: The vest is great and the color and reflective tape are perfect. It was large for my jack Russell terrier, but some quick sewing with some Velcro took care of that and it is a hit with our dog. Just a bit larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little small for the measurements given, but was extremely helpful for keeping track of my black lab at night during a camping trip! She also didn’t complain about being overly hot while wearing it and she gets miserable when she is too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blaze orange vest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size medium for my 53lb dainty golden retriever. It fits her perfectly using all the Velcro. Her girth is 24" and would easily fit up to 28" or so. We walk mostly in the woods and it is hunting season. She dies not seem bothered by it at all. It's very lightweight and the reflective qualities are great. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: 87Lindah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - Stays On, Lasts Long
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rough and tumbling girl. She runs HARD in the woods, and this thing stays on. It's basically a miracle. The velcro has pulled away from the fabric a little, and she did manage to tear a small hole in it, but I blame that on her, not the product. I've yet to find anything that stays on her, and this does.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Perron

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on all three dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for each of our dogs to wear while hiking during hunting season. We haven't tested out the durability yet, but the sizes fit great for the most part. We have a 25lb puppy that fits great in the small, there was a little extra length on the stomach strap but we're going to safety pin it so it doesn't hang. The medium fits our 55lb Australian shepherd/border collie mix and the large was a perfect fit for our 60lb German shepherd/catahoula mix.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hicks-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pitiful fastener. Needs more velcro.
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. the sized was still too small for small dogs. The velcro latch was way too long, and it would take some custom work to get it to work right. Only buy if you got an American Bulldog. Don't expect it to fit an English bulldog.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog, who has been trained by my husband and I. I wanted people to be able to see him at night, since he walks off leash. I also wanted something I could get embroidered with our dog training company name. I bought the size for a 60-70 pound dog, and he is about 70 pounds. It barely fits around his chest, and his neck, but the Velcro will come off. I am going to get elastic bands to expand the length. Overall, it's a cute little product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: Decent vest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest for early morning walks when it is really dark. I live near a hospital so there is always traffic in the morning. The vest seems comfortable on my yellow lab mix. It's so lightweight he doesn't mind it at all! Since we didn't get hit by a car, I'm assuming it worked! I felt more confident while walking that others could see us. I anticipate this vest lasting us through the winter if not longer, but I doubt it will last long if used for anything other than leash walking.
customer_reviews.author: lw1157

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good quality vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great for dogs. It is highly reflective and is easy to see. However, I bought a small for our poodle/Maltese and the stomach strap is a little big on him. I don't mind it so much because it's not in the way and I could easily fit a sweater underneath when it gets cold out. Anyway, great price for a good quality vest.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not correct size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in large for my smaller golden retriever. Package had sticker on it that said large but when I took product out had an M for medium tag on it and didn't even come close to fitting my 70 lb dog. Material was pretty skimpy too. Bummed since I didn't want to reorder in case the same thing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but not light duty
customer_reviews.text: First, it fits!! I'm using it for both safety and as an alternative to the expensive Service Dog Vests. It is easy seen both during the day and at night and my large dog is so comfortable in it that he has fallen asleep wearing it. It is also very easy to put on him and take off; it literally takes less than a minute to put on and seconds to take off. Buddy wears it everywhere we go and I would definitely recommend this vest to others for the same purpose or just for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Joy K. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight. Belly strap was still to large for my 23# doxie beagle mix but fit his thicker littermate fine. I fixed the issue with a safety pin.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyG

customer_reviews.title: Waaaayyy too big.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small and it did not fit my poodle mix at all! So huge! And then I had gotten it while I was out of town and was unable to get it with then30 days, so I cannnot return it. It is cute but they need to get the sizes right
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Secure Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Fits 77lb weim like a glove. I was worried about the velcro but it has not come off yet! Very happy about that. He rolls around on the ground when he is wearing things too. has even made it through the washer.
customer_reviews.author: KASEY A.

customer_reviews.title: One of the reasons that I bought it though was for our bike rides (we use the Walky Dog which is great btw! )
customer_reviews.text: It reflects really well and keeps my pup very visible. One of the reasons that I bought it though was for our bike rides (we use the Walky Dog which is great btw!). It's come undone and flown off twice. I've found it both times, but this vest is much better suited for when your dog will not be running. It fits him really well. He's a 28 lb. Swedish Vallhund. He's corgi-shaped so I was worried about it not fitting the length of his body, but we had zero issues in that department.
customer_reviews.author: TaraNicole

customer_reviews.title: great product but sizing runs BIG
customer_reviews.text: I am an over the road truck driver and got this for walking my dog at night in high traffic areas. Vest is adorable and very well made. However, the sizing runs BIG BIG. Got a small for my 16 pound mini Schnauzer and it fits neck to tail and wraps slightly under her belly which causes the belly strap to be too long to use. I made sewing alterations rather than return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Minton

customer_reviews.title: Velcro isn't very strong
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog in a gamelands, and she wears this vest as we walk. I let her off-leash, and she likes to run through the fields and trees. Unfortunately, it takes her about 10 minutes of running around before this vest gets snagged and rips off. I don't think this would be a problem with stronger velcro. I get the positives to tear-away clothing for dogs, but this is just a little too easy to tear away.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Rohrbacher

customer_reviews.title: Works Great As A Storm Jacket For Our Basset!
customer_reviews.text: Our basset loves this jacket! He is afraid of storms and thinks when he is wearing his jacket that the storm can't get him! He usually wants to keep it on full time for several days after a storm. We have a fenced yard, so he doesn't need the protection feature for being seen, but it does wonders for his self-esteem and storm fear! He thinks he is invincible when he is wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: greygoose

customer_reviews.title: Our pets are our kids protect them! This will help
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 90lb chocolate lab because we’ve moved to a woodsy area and there are tons of hunters, he also loves to take off and go see our neighbors. With this I feel a little better about his crazy antics. He’s learn to love it and I’m happy he’s safe. With this we can see him a mile away. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: These vests are awesome. I have 2x50lb dogs that are a mix of pit bull, shephard and labrador. They are bull dozers through fields and brush. These vest have withstood amazing punishment and weigh next to nothing. I bought the large first and then exchanged for the medium, which fits like a glove. The dogs don't mind them at all, in fact they get excited when I put them on them cause they know they are going to romp.
customer_reviews.author: Caddis

customer_reviews.title: My toy poodle loves her bright jacket
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a fence and my doggie is gray in color. She blends well into the terrain of the country side, or the asphalt. I worry a lot about her getting run over in case she runs out in our circle. We live out of the way of heavy traffic and she never leaves the yard. but you never know.She wears her windbreaker every time she goes out and you can spot her anywhere. The stripes and the paw are reflectors. I bought matching collar also.
customer_reviews.author: Beata Viszmegh

customer_reviews.title: Had to made alteration but good for job
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a Jack Russell, Carrian cross, rescue, thing, We love her. She is 11 pounds and the small vest is too large for her. So I just took it in at the middle with a quick stint at the sewing machine. The strap needed to be shortened too, but it was all very easy. The material is fine and it is really reflective which was to goal for night walking. I think the coat might be good protection for light rain.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: whats good about it
customer_reviews.text: So, whats good about it? Its very bright colored and reflective. It goes on easy. The material, for my dogs, isn't tough enough. I have high drive German Shepards(S&R). Put this on so crazies with firearms wouldn't have thoughts of Wolf. When the dogs went under the barbed wire fence... old fence, the material gets cut like a knife. So, if your a city dweller, these are fine. But if you encounter something sharp, your dog will do these in in short order.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Acres

customer_reviews.title: Great vest exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest, it looks well made and just like the picture in the Ad. The medium fits my 75 lb mastiff Puppy well, the large was a little small for my 105 lb barrel chested lab, but will be perfect for my pup as he gets a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: heather snowman

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but the large was a little small in girth for my 73-pound hound/boxer/Rhodesian mix. This was easily remedied with some extra Velcro strap, though.
customer_reviews.author: Wayfaring

customer_reviews.title: Save Your MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this twice. The straps came off after only a couple days. I got this for hunting season, and both sets did not even last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Stays on well and makes our earth-colored pup stand out during our woods walks. No more panicking when I think she has "run off" when she's actually 20 ft away. Also makes it obvious to others she's not a small deer.....which she strongly resembles.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis P

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and reflective, but not so durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest that makes your pet stand out. It's the right color orange and the reflective part is great. It fit my dog well. He was 60lbs and I ordered a large. However, it isn't all that durable. It was ripped within a week. If your dog is active at all such as going into the woods, rolling around, etc it won't last very long. I got it because we live on a farm with acreage and am worried about hunters. My advice, it's great for leash walking or in an open space...any chance of your dog getting into woods or rubbing it against anything..don't put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Baylee

customer_reviews.title: Vest for night-time running
customer_reviews.text: My 90 lb German Shepherd wears this vest when we run in the evenings. She is easily seen and doesn't mind the vest at all. It actually helps her to know "we're going to work" and to behave :) The vest is a perfect size...almost too small for her large abdomen (wide bone structure, not fat), but that's ok for us. If she was doing more jumping and athletic types of training, she would probably need the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very reflective!
customer_reviews.text: Great vest, very reflective. It fits my 6 month old 60lbs lab puppy when it's near as tight as it will go. Glad he will have room to grow! My only complaint is that the Velcro isn't as strong as I feel it should be, I may have to reinforce it. My pup was able to shake it loose.
customer_reviews.author: Spuderific

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Stitching came undone after one week of normal dog wear, at the point where the belly band meets the side. I was able to sew it easily, but I expect the entire vest to fall apart in the not-too-distant future. I gave it two stars instead of one because when it does fall apart I can at least use it as a pattern to sew my own vest. The large size fits my 70-something pound golden retriever well, much better than some other vests I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: M-Lo

customer_reviews.title: ==Did not fit!!! it is a small ...
customer_reviews.text: ==Did not fit!!! it is a small vest....Way way to big!!! huge! I have a chiwennie, and even an extra small, did not fit!! so the sizing is way off...not as advertised......Plus, id ship it back but they want half of what it cost me in the first place....Try again!
customer_reviews.author: Ron and Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Good if your dog does not run like a nut through the woods
customer_reviews.text: My dog wore it one time and it has a puncture rip in it and the waistband has come unstitched. It is flimsy nylon. It goes on nice and fits well but will not hold up in the Maine woods. If you walk your dog on the sidewalk, you'll probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Moose Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking now that it's getting dark earlier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking now that it's getting dark earlier. The pups are clearly visible and I don't worry as much about people not seeing us walking up our street (no sidewalks and little lighting the last quarter mile). Oh- my dog has a 32" chest so I got a large just in case but I think that a medium would have been good because I have to tighten the chest strap all the way.
customer_reviews.author: meghan d

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking now that it's getting dark earlier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking now that it's getting dark earlier. The pups are clearly visible and I don't worry as much about people not seeing us walking up our street (no sidewalks and little lighting the last quarter mile). Oh- my dog has a 32" chest so I got a large just in case but I think that a medium would have been good because I have to tighten the chest strap all the way.
customer_reviews.author: meghan d

customer_reviews.title: Supersupervisible!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Incredibly bright and can be seen from far away, whether you shine a light on it or not! Outshines my neon pink parka by a mile. - Takes mere seconds to put on and take off. - Very lightweight. - Dries fast. Cons: - Just a tad shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Smulan

customer_reviews.title: The color is great; visible from a far distance
customer_reviews.text: I bougtht 3 of these for my Goldens that blend right in with the changing colors of New England in the Fall. The color is great; visible from a far distance. My Goldens run swim, through the woods and hop over things in the landscape everyday. The material on these vests is VERY thin and the velcro isn't very strong. My dogs tore, ripped and eventually lost the vests within one month. I have since ordered more durable vests for my dogs needs.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: Very reflective, perfect for safety around hunters
customer_reviews.text: My parents moved to a cabin nearby to where hunting takes place and my dad constantly walks the dog around the property. I feel much better knowing that they're both a lot more visible now. The reflective silver parts are truly very reflective, we can see the dog from very far away in minimal light conditions, the first time we saw him out in the yard in it at night, we started laughing because it's so surprisingly reflective! The dog really doesn't mind wearing the vest, though he's always been pretty laid back. He's a lab (though a bit on the smaller side for a lab), and the large size vest fits him very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Charity M

customer_reviews.title: Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits any size dog by design; velcro up front and underneath insure this will fit almost any dog and stay fastened. Bright orange color and highly reflective side logos will make sure Fido is NOT mistaken for an animal and give you the peace of mind to have them outside even in hunting season, thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Misterart

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large for my Lab/Rhodesian ridgeback mix that is a beautiful golden brown just like a deer. He is roughly 70 pounds and it fits him perfectly! It has Velcro straps under the neck and under the chest for easy size adjustment. I am very pleased with this vest, It's a very bright orange in the reflectors work well. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ring

product_meta.title: Petflect Reflective Dog Vest
product_meta.description: Size:SmallMade of light weight breathable nylon. Features a decorative reflective paw print and reflective stripes. Fully adjustable Velcro fasteners. Visible from more than 500 feet. 6 in. L X 4 in. W X 2 in. H. 0.2 lbs.. The key to staying safe on the road, in the woods or in any outdoor setting you share with your dog is being seen. The perfect reflective safety vest provides owners with peace of mind that their dog is easy to spot. Dogs will forget they are wearing the light weight vest made with durable fully adjustable Velcro fasteners and breathable nylon material for comfort. A paw print design, horizontal stripe, and trim made from reflective material provide owners with long range visibility of their dog from more than 500 feet away. Be seen and stay safe.
feature_bullets: Features A Decorative Reflective Paw Print And Reflective Stripes
Package Dimensions: 7.5" L x 5.7" W x 1.2" H

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
